name: Poly Multisample
description: This algorithm is inspired by the original 'SD Multisample' algorithm on the disting EX and hints from the Crossfade Loop Synth VST plug-in. It functions as a polyphonic sample playback instrument, playing WAV files from the MicroSD card with support for recording audio (sampling) and applying crossfade looping to create smooth looping pads. The algorithm can be triggered via CV/gate, MIDI, or I2C, supports velocity switches and round robins per sample, and shares features described in 'Common polysynth features' and 'Samples on the MicroSD card'.
short_description: A polyphonic sample player with crossfade looping and multi-trigger support.
gui_description: The display shows played notes with superimposed note envelopes, folder/filename of the last sample, microtuning info, and trim/loop point adjustments. Crossfade position is visualized for each voice when enabled.

parameters.name: Folder
parameters.description: Sets the sample folder to use.

parameters.name: Crossfade length
parameters.description: Sets the crossfade looping duration as a percentage of loop time.

parameters.name: Loop point fine
parameters.description: Adjusts the loop point in sample frames.

parameters.name: Gate offset
parameters.description: Offsets gate inputs relative to pitch inputs (useful for CV settling).

parameters.name: Confirm change
parameters.description: Sets whether folder/sample changes require confirmation.

parameters.name: Attack
parameters.description: Sets envelope attack time (1ms to 15s, exponential).

parameters.name: Decay
parameters.description: Sets envelope decay time (20ms to 15s, exponential).

parameters.name: Release
parameters.description: Sets envelope release time (10ms to 30s, exponential).

input_ports.name: CV pitch input
input_ports.description: Pitch control via CV (shared with standard polysynth CV/gate parameters)

input_ports.name: MIDI input
input_ports.description: Standard MIDI note and control messages

output_ports.name: Audio left output
output_ports.description: Left channel audio output (bus 13 by default)

output_ports.name: Audio right output
output_ports.description: Right channel audio output (bus 0 by default)
